channel.title: Reuters on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Reuters on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Reuters, AP Issue Joint Letter to Israel Demanding Answers Over Journalists Killed in Hospital Airstrike: “We Are Outraged”
item.description: On Monday, 20 people, including 5 journalists, died after an Israeli strike on Nasser Medical Complex in Gaza.
